resources.string: Locally encrypted secret keys. Authorize transactions before they happen.
Built for elegance and ease of use.
Open sourced code for full transparency. Provided completely free of cost.
A word from our humble developer
Thanks for installing my app! If you enjoy it, please consider rating it in the Play Store or donating!
Here is your account \"seed\". For all intents and purposes, your seed represents the entirety of your Stellar account.
Do not share your seed with anyone.
View and copy this seed somewhere very safe.
Lumina makes no guarantee of keeping this for you under any circumstances. If you do not retain this, you risk losing access to your account and funds.
We will encrypt this seed within the local database using a passphrase you provide in the next step.
